backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing a gaming chatbot backend that stores conversation history and generates keyword-based responses about game genres, specific games, gaming culture, and dynamically builds self-contained HTML game payloads.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two implemented features: a generic GameRenderer that handles any HTML game payload, and updated ChatInterface empty-state prompts with diverse game-building suggestions.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-sentence summaries of each frontend source file, serving as a reference for the project's frontend architecture and component responsibilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base CSS file defining light and dark OKLCH CSS custom properties for the shadcn/ui design token system including colors, borders, and sidebar variables.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point that mounts the React app into a root div and loads the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that renders ChatInterface as the sole view of the application.
frontend/src/components/ChatInput.tsx: Auto-resizing textarea input component with Enter-to-send support, a neon-styled send button, and disabled state management during AI responses.
frontend/src/components/ChatInterface.ts: Main chat layout component featuring a header, scrollable message list, typing indicator, and an empty state with 8 game-building prompts and 5 gaming-info prompts as suggestions.
frontend/src/components/GameRenderer.tsx: Generic game renderer component that extracts self-contained HTML from any gamePayload (raw HTML or legacy JSON-wrapped format) and displays it in a sandboxed iframe with expand/collapse functionality and error handling.
frontend/src/components/MessageBubble.ts: Renders a single chat message bubble for either a user or AI role, formatting timestamps and optionally embedding a GameRenderer component when the AI message includes a game payload.
Displays an animated three-dot typing indicator with the AI avatar, shown while the AI is generating a response.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, invalidating dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useChat.ts: Custom hook managing chat state by combining conversation history, optimistic user messages, and a send-message mutation, exposing messages, typing status, and send/clear actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and hook, handling AuthClient creation, login, logout, and persisting identity across page reloads.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching conversation history, sending messages, and clearing local conversation cache via the ICP backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet defining dark-first CSS custom properties (OKLCH color tokens, neon glow variables), Tailwind base/utilities imports, custom scrollbar styles, and Space Grotesk/Mono fonts.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrapping the root App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the theme with OKLCH-based color tokens, neon glow box shadows, Space Grotesk/Mono fonts, and custom keyframe animations, with typography and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state manifest tracking the GameChat AI project version, existing completed features, and pending feature requests for AI-generated game payloads and expanded game-building prompts.
